summary: Documentation clarification about which error types cause WorkflowExecutionFailed vs WorkflowTaskFailed events. User was confused about when TemporalFailure and ApplicationFailure with different nonRetryable settings trigger which event types.
userImpact: Developers may misunderstand which error types result in which workflow failure events and how retry policies apply.
resolutionDetails: Issue author clarified their misunderstanding through discussion with maintainer - behavior is working as designed.
keyQuote: Oh, retry policy is for `WorkflowExecutionFailed`s, not for `WorkflowTaskFailed`, got it. I misread TS docs.
